text: bottle from Getränke Fleischmann Wörth an der Isar. Pale yellow, tall head. Shy malty background delivering some rather nice aromatic hops, citrusy and fruity.

Fläschle (Danke Stockach!): Pale golden to golden, a bit unclear, mid-sized stable white lacy head; perfumed nose of exotic fruits and floral hops, some pale malt in the background; moderate bitter-sweet flavour, light to medium bodied, creamy MF; lingering sweet-bitter finish with exotic fruits and a floral bitterness. Well balanced, well made, but too perfumed! Overrated IMHO...

UPDATED: MAY 14, 2017 Bottle from ErlangerNick thanks my friend. Hazy gold colour lasting white head. Tasty lager malts in the mouth light but pleasant after a morning chopping f***ing wood. Not much aroma. Light lemon finish. Utterly drinkable when gagging for a beer.

Helles gelb schöner schaum, im Geruch sehr schön hopfig fruchtig grasig blumig, im Geschmack dominiert auch der Hopfen blumig grasig mit leichter Frucht etwas malzig mit mittelherben, recht süffig und recht lecker.

(bottle, 33cl) Slightly hazy, pale golden colour with a big and loose foamy white head. Fruity hoppy aroma with notes of citrus, lemon, also hints of grass and a tinge of onions. Moderately bitter and delicately sweet flavour, light to medium bodied with a calm carbonation. Dry pale malty base with notes of white bread and a good dash of citric, lemony and mildly grassy hops; dry and moderately hop bitter fruity and slightly grassy finish with a balancing, mildly sweet malt-character. Refreshing Helles. 02.VI.17

Clear golden with little white head. Aroma is mint, hops, melisse, some green apple. Taste is sweet green apple, some starch and bitter hops. Medium drinkable, herbal bitter aftertaste. A bit too herbal for me. Overall decent.
Bottle. Very pale, almost green golden, offwhite head. Light buttered aromatic hop aroma, medium body, cake like, perfumed, berry, tropical, a hint diacetyl, fruit melonlike finish

UPDATED: APR 5, 2017 Bottle. Slightly cloudy golden color with white head. Aroma is buttery (the good kind), exotic fruits, grassy hops. Taste is more butter, fruits, grassy, pale malts, quite moreish! Oily mouthfeel. Refreshing and nourishing at the same time - if you can handle the diacetyl.

Bottle 330ml. @ home. [ As Wolfscraft Das Helle ].Clear medium yellow color with a average to large, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, white head. Aroma is moderate to light heavy malty, pale malt, fruity malt, moderate hoppy, grass, fruity hops. Flavor is moderate sweet and bitter with a long duration, fruity malt, pale malt, grass, fruity hops, pisner hops, green hops. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20170320]
 7-3-7-3-15

330ml bottle. Milky, yellow-ish golden colour with average, fluffy, fairly lasting, moderately lacing, snow-white head. Fresh, grassy and slightly citrusy, hoppy aroma, notes of lemon, lemon tea, lemongrass, Taste is slightly dry, fresh grassy and citrusy hoppy, minimally sweet, pale malty basis, hints of lemon, lemongrass, a touch of lemon zest and lime.

0,33l Flasche. Hellgelbes Bier mit weissem sehr ansprechendem Schaum. Es duftet lecker nach frischem Hopfen, Citrus, frisch geschnittenem Gras. Antrunk nach Mandarine und Hopfen. Citrusschale. Frischer und runder Geschmack. Im Abgang Hopfenbittere. Lang anhaltend. Schon lange kein solch gutes Helles getrunken!

33cl MHD08/2017, Maruhn. - Clearly the stellar brew of the newfangled trilogy. Fluffy eggwhite pour, natural soapy foam bubbles. Immensely aromatic and sweetly perfumed, mostly sweet lychee, canned in sweet syrup along with its peel. Sustains that lychee exotics in flavours, adding some canned gooseberry and sweet white grape: putting the ?Citra to work really well. Almost reminiscent of fruit whey, exotic Fruchtmolke sans the lacto tang. Body, bubbles and ABV at the service of that single perfume mission. Very light and summery, drinks like a natural mix. This should have been branded their Super Lager. - Paired with: spicy 3-cup chicken - too delicate for that. Thai basil is an IPA or brown ale fiend?
330ml Flasche. Klar und golden mit kleiner Schaumkrone. Blumiges Aroma mit Citrusnoten. Süffig. Leichter Körper. Lecker!
Pours a clean and clear golden with a lacing, frothy dark white head. Rich golden malt nose, simple malt taste, sweet and lightly bready.

Bottle 33cl. poured into a lager glass. Slightly hazy pale to medium golden, mostly diminishing, good lacing; aromatic nose, aroma pale malts, grain, lemon, star fruit, grass, bit barnyard; mild taste, medium sweet and bitter, grainy, grassy; mild and hoppy sweetbitter aftertaste, light herbal and spicy notes; light body, watery to oily texture, soft carbonation; very pleasant hoppy Helles.
33cl bottle. Klare hell goldgelbe Farbe, mittelgroße weiße schaumkrone. Geruch aromatisch dezent aromatisch hopfig, helles malz. Geschmack mild hopfig, grasig bitter, helles malz, gut!
Hell hopfiger, süßlich grasiger Antrunk. Wenig herber Mittelteil, spritzig, der Hopfen bleibt rund. Die Getreidigkeit steigt an, sehr süffig. Gut. 10/11/11/11/11/11
